### A web application for systematic collection of political science research data

## About This Project

This application facilitates distributed data collection for research on citizen-initiated democratic instruments across countries. Research assistants (coders) complete structured questionnaires, while administrators manage templates, users, and analyze submitted responses.

## Features

- **Flexible Questionnaires**: Support for multiple field types (dropdowns, text, radio buttons, dates)
- **Role-Based Access**: Separate interfaces for coders and administrators
- **Auto-Save Drafts**: Never lose your work with automatic draft saving
- **CSV Export**: Export collected data for analysis
- **Progress Tracking**: Visual indicators show completion status
